name: A. From Hero to Zero
statement:
You are given an integer n and an integer k.In one step you can do one
of the following moves: decrease n by 1; divide n by k if n is divisible
by k. For example, if n = 27 and k = 3 you can do the following steps:
27
rightarrow 26
rightarrow 25
rightarrow 24
rightarrow 8
rightarrow 7
rightarrow 6
rightarrow 2
rightarrow 1
rightarrow 0.You are asked to calculate the minimum number of steps to
reach 0 from n.
